title: conferred on me by section 240 of the Defence Act 1954 (No. 18 of 1954),
heading: 1. These Rules may be cited as the Rules of Procedure (Defence Forces)
text_raw:
1. These Rules may be cited as the Rules of Procedure (Defence Forces) 

(Amendment) Rules 2024.
text_norm: 1 rule may cited rule procedure (defence forces) (amendment) rule 2024

title: conferred on me by section 240 of the Defence Act 1954 (No. 18 of 1954),
heading: 2. The Rules of Procedure (Defence Forces) 2019 and 2023 and these Rules
text_raw:
2. The Rules of Procedure (Defence Forces) 2019 and 2023 and these Rules 
may be cited together as the Rules of Procedure (Defence Forces) 2019 to 2024 
and shall be construed together as one.
text_norm: 2 rule procedure (defence forces) 2019 2023 rule may cited together rule procedure (defence forces) 2019 2024 shall construed together one

title: conferred on me by section 240 of the Defence Act 1954 (No. 18 of 1954),
heading: 3. Rule 2 of the Rules of Procedure (Defence Forces) 2019 (S.I. No. 555 of
text_raw:
3. Rule 2 of the Rules of Procedure (Defence Forces) 2019 (S.I. No. 555 of 

2019) is amended— 

(a) by substituting the following for the definition of “investigating 

officer”: 

““investigating officer” means a commanding officer or an 
officer appointed in accordance with section 177 of the Act;”, and 

(b) by substituting the following for the definition of “prosecutor”: 

““prosecutor” means the Director and includes a court-martial 
prosecutor appointed in accordance with section 184F (1) of the 
Act and counsel instructed by or representing either;”.
text_norm: 3 rule 2 rule procedure (defence forces) 2019 (s.i no 555 2019) amended-- (a) substituting following definition investigating officer investigating officer mean commanding officer officer appointed accordance section 177 act (b) substituting following definition prosecutor prosecutor mean director includes court-martial prosecutor appointed accordance section 184f (1) act counsel instructed representing either

title: conferred on me by section 240 of the Defence Act 1954 (No. 18 of 1954),
heading: 4. These Rules shall come into operation on 6 November 2024.
text_raw:
4. These Rules shall come into operation on 6 November 2024. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

5 November, 2024. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 
Minister for Defence. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [611] 3
text_norm: 4 rule shall come operation 6 november 2024 given official seal 5 november 2024 micheal martin minister defence notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 8th november 2024 611 3

title: conferred on me by section 240 of the Defence Act 1954 (No. 18 of 1954),
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

Following on from the enactment of the Defence (Amendment) Act 2024, these 
Rules amend the definitions in the Rules of Procedure (Defence Forces) 2019 
for “investigating officer” and “prosecutor” in line with the provisions of that 
Act. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [611]
